text: hi I'm Ryan Worley a senior technical
product manager for AWS Marketplace
today I'm going to show you a valuable
new resource for accessing AWS
Marketplace private offers extended to
your account which is helpful when you
need to locate an offer link
you no longer need to depend on an email
link to locate a private offer now AWS
Marketplace offers a Consolidated view
of all private offers extended to your
account
to view your offers first sign into your
AWS account through the AWS Management
console and then click AWS Marketplace
subscriptions to open the AWS
Marketplace console
the new private offers page is here
under managed subscriptions in the
left-hand pane of the AWS Marketplace
console
once you click private offers you'll
find all private offers that are
available for you to accept on the
available offers tab
linked accounts in an AWS organization
will be able to see private offers
extended to the payer account also known
as a management account and their AWS
organization
the private offers page provides you
with the offer specific URL for each
available private offer click the offer
ID link to get to the procurement page
for each offer you can see the product
the seller of record which can be a
Consulting partner or independent
software vendor the publisher the
expiration date and when the offer was
received
note that the seller sets the expiration
date for your private offers and you
can't accept an offer after it is
expired
you can check if an offer has expired on
the accepted and expired offers tab you
can also find active agreements
associated with offers that you have
accepted
in order to view the private offers page
you need one of the following
permissions
remember root account users will have
permissions to view this page by default
but IM users will need one of these
permissions to view this page
if you are not using an AWS manage
policy the following IAM actions are
required to view the private offers page
thanks for viewing how to identify
private offers extended to your account
view your offers now at the following
link
